name: ovulatory
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
involving, caused by, or experiencing ovulation (= the production of an egg by a woman or female animal): The drug is widely used as an ovulatory stimulant. Numerous studies demonstrate that pregnancy is most likely to occur during the first three ovulatory cycles. Compare
anovulatory
More examplesFewer examplesFollowing ovulation the ovulatory follicle must be capable of forming a viable corpus luteum if pregnancy is to be maintained.Women with ovulatory dysfunctions are successfully treated with this drug.Attempts were made to evaluate the effects of stress on ovulatory incidence.
